originContent: Automatic blue-light filter for Hyprland, Niri, and everything Wayland
translatedContent: Automatic blue-light filter for Hyprland, Niri, and everything Wayland

originContent: ![This image was taken using a shader to simulate the effect of sunsetr](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psi4j/sunsetr/main/.github/assets/sunsetr.png)
translatedContent: ![This image was taken using a shader to simulate the effect of sunsetr](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psi4j/sunsetr/main/.github/assets/sunsetr.png)

originContent: Sunsetr is an automatic blue-light filter for Wayland compositors. It automates smooth color-temperature transitions from neutral to warmer tones, designed to reduce eye strain and improve sleep. Sunsetr automatically adjusts your displays based on your geolocation or manual time settings. It can also be used to persist the same color-temperature and gamma indefinitely, and can alternate between various user-defined presets. The controller can integrate with and automate changes in your shell or UI applications via IPC.
translatedContent: Sunsetr is an automatic blue-light filter for Wayland compositors. It automates smooth color-temperature transitions from neutral to warmer tones, designed to reduce eye strain and improve sleep. Sunsetr automatically adjusts your displays based on your geolocation or manual time settings. It can also be used to persist the same color-temperature and gamma indefinitely, and can alternate between various user-defined presets. The controller can integrate with and automate changes in your shell or UI applications via IPC.

originContent: - **Multi-Compositor Support**: Works with Hyprland, Niri, Sway, River, Wayfire, and other Wayland compositors
translatedContent: - **Multi-Compositor Support**: Works with Hyprland, Niri, Sway, River, Wayfire, and other Wayland compositors

originContent: - **Native Hyprland CTM Backend**: Direct Color Transformation Matrix support for Hyprland
translatedContent: - **Native Hyprland CTM Backend**: Direct Color Transformation Matrix support for Hyprland

originContent: - **Smarter hyprsunset Management**: Add longer, cleaner, and more precise sunset/sunrise transitions to hyprsunset (Hyprland)
translatedContent: - **Smarter hyprsunset Management**: Add longer, cleaner, and more precise sunset/sunrise transitions to hyprsunset (Hyprland)

originContent: - **Smooth Transitions**: Configurable fade effects with adaptive algorithm
translatedContent: - **Smooth Transitions**: Configurable fade effects with adaptive algorithm

originContent: - **Preset Management**: Quick switching between configuration profiles (e.g., day, gaming, weekend)
translatedContent: - **Preset Management**: Quick switching between configuration profiles (e.g., day, gaming, weekend)

originContent: - **Hot Reloading**: Live updates when config files change - no restart needed
translatedContent: - **Hot Reloading**: Live updates when config files change - no restart needed

originContent: - **IPC for Automation**: Unix socket-based IPC for scripting and external integrations
translatedContent: - **IPC for Automation**: Unix socket-based IPC for scripting and external integrations

originContent: - **Geolocation-based Transitions**: Automatic sunrise/sunset calculation based on your location
translatedContent: - **Geolocation-based Transitions**: Automatic sunrise/sunset calculation based on your location

originContent: - **Interactive City Selection**: Choose from 10,000+ cities worldwide for precise coordinates
translatedContent: - **Interactive City Selection**: Choose from 10,000+ cities worldwide for precise coordinates

originContent: - **Automatic Timezone Detection**: Falls back to system timezone for location approximation
translatedContent: - **Automatic Timezone Detection**: Falls back to system timezone for location approximation

originContent: - **Universal Wayland Support**: Direct protocol communication on Wayland compositors
translatedContent: - **Universal Wayland Support**: Direct protocol communication on Wayland compositors

originContent: - **Smart Defaults**: Works beautifully out-of-the-box with carefully tuned settings
translatedContent: - **Smart Defaults**: Works beautifully out-of-the-box with carefully tuned settings

originContent: - **Flexible Configuration**: Extensive customization options for power users
translatedContent: - **Flexible Configuration**: Extensive customization options for power users

originContent: - [x] Implement IPC for scripting and external integrations
translatedContent: - [x] Implement IPC for scripting and external integrations

originContent: - to wlsunset, hyprsunset, and redshift for inspiration
translatedContent: - to wlsunset, hyprsunset, and redshift for inspiration

originContent: - to the Hyprwm team for making Hyprland possible
translatedContent: - to the Hyprwm team for making Hyprland possible

originContent: - to the niri team for making the best Rust-based Wayland compositor
translatedContent: - to the niri team for making the best Rust-based Wayland compositor

originContent: - to the Wayland community for the robust protocol ecosystem
translatedContent: - to the Wayland community for the robust protocol ecosystem
